description:
Learn blender from a award winning instructor. Learn about how blender works and also how you can create your first 3d models, characters and also how you can create fantastic simulations like water or fire in 3d.

In this Tutorial Series i will teach you, how easy it can be to start with your own work inside of Blender. Blender is a mighty and complete free 3d software package that you can use also for all your commercial works.

With Blender you can create for example your complete own 3D Movie and that in a very short time. At the End of this Course you will have all the Basic Knowledge you need to create your own fantastic 3d projects.

Who is this class for?

People who want to improve their technical skills
Blender beginners
People who want to make money by learning new skills

Why should you learn online?

Udemy is an online education platform where revolution taking place. You may have heard already about udemy in the news, or over "google" or you heard it already from a friend. Education is going to be changed forever. 

I promise that this course will be better and much more effective than reading books. 

What you need?

You need to have an internet connection
Blender - A complete free 3d modeling program

What you will learn?

You will learn how blender works and how you can create your first 3d models, characters and also how you can create fantastic simulations like water or fire in 3d.
title: Your First Day in Blender
